title: BONUS IP on OCE too?(premade)
body:
Can anyone confirm if the NA  announcement for bonus IP from premading is being trialed in Oce as well? We have no announcement and there was no mention of specific servers in the original post...

 Rito Plz

replies.body: Yep it will be coming, it's just not enabled yet. Once it's enabled we will put the news post up about it.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Zl6g7WxV,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-02T23:57:43.618+0000)
>
> Yep it will be coming, it's just not enabled yet. Once it's enabled we will put the news post up about it.

its enabled now a friend and I just noticed it but there is no news post
There's a link to it in the client, and in Sephyre's other post in this thread, but there's not on the website yet.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Zl6g7WxV,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-02T23:57:43.618+0000)
>
> Yep it will be coming, it's just not enabled yet. Once it's enabled we will put the news post up about it.

{{champion:115}} this is how much it makes me smile
It's up now: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/team-and-earn-party-rewards

>There is a chance your group earns no Party Reward, but larger premade groups win higher tiers of IP rewards.

What is the percentage split winning and not winning?
And does this chance (not just the rewards) depend/vary upon number of players in a queue?

Is this only a chance mechanism because it is being looked about permanently? 
I think 100% IP rewards could be a fun boost for all Holiday period/Events, but does seem a little much if was permanent.
Come on Rito this deserves an answer, and honestly should have been explained better in your news post.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Zl6g7WxV,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-03-03T00:14:51.116+0000)
>
> It's up now: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/team-and-earn-party-rewards

will the IP boost still apply in matches made by team builder?
My educated guess will be the number of players you have in your lobby before searching for players.

My guess for other queues; 
**Blind Pick **- Rewards up to 5 pre-made
**Twisted Treeline **- Rewards up to 3 pre-made
**Team Bulider **- However many you have premade prior to searching for teammates. Can get all 5 if you add all 5.
**Solo queue** - Wouldn't apply (Similar reason to why OCE Week didn't apply - they don't wish there to be any external factor effecting ranked queue decisions.)
**Ranked 5's** - see above
ranked 5s DEFO gives the bonus....infact so far ranked 5s has been the biggest bonus i have gotten...8

Ah I guess I was wrong about that assumption.
Have you seen anything increase with duo queue?
It is kind of BS. I queued up as a member of a team of 5 in a normal summoners rift game. We won. I got an amazing bonus of 28 ip.
You're lucky, biggest bonus I've got is 2 IP. With a 5-man pre-made...
28 is HUGE. was playing with heartvine, got 2 at most. we played what? 3-4 games...
Curious, has anyone actually gotten any rewards from the bonus? And was it a win or a lose (just curious/thinking of keeping track for riot)

almost always.  i think 1 win got 0. but the rest got 1 and 2 IP, and ranked 5s win got 8.
always full 5 premade, so x16 max rewards....now if thats x16 the base 100ish for a win....that would be epic to get...but so far nothing over 10....i think its poorly set up.

it SHOULD be minimum 0, but minimum when you GET a reward is based off the multiplier, so 2 man base WIN is 2, 16 for 5 man. since then its ACTUALLY noticeable. atm 2 man mostly gets the same reward a 5 man gets, its only when the JACKPOT goes off that you actually see a difference...
someone add me for this premade team.
Which queue are you playing?
I know we get it, but is it currently active for us atm? :O
yess something that encourages being nice to people
ya we get it too
